Project #2:	


Title		: Sales & Supply Chain Data Warehouse Implementation
Client		: Hindustan Unilever Limited 
Duration	: Jan 2016- Mar 2017
Designation	: Qlikview Developer
Team size	: 5

Description:

This Project has involved building an enterprise-wide data warehouse for Hindustan unite Limited - which is the Indian arm of Unilever Limited and is India’s largest FMCG Company – from ground up.  The warehouse serves the needs of all the profit centres in HLL including beverages, detergents, personal care products, ice creams and foods.  For each profit center, it stores the data for the entire sales and supply chain starting from raw material purchase, packing material   purchase,  transportation  of  materials  to  factories, inventory and production of finished goods at factories, dispatch of goods to depots, inventory at depots, primary sales of goods to distributors, secondary sales of goods to retailers, etc. The warehouse further captures all the financial expenditure related to the marketing and advertising of products and brands, computation of net proceeds from sales, tracking and settlement of expense claims from distributors, etc.




Responsilities:

· Developed project documentation, testing materials, training materials, requirements gathering including downstream and upstream interface requirements and adhering to a project management methodology 
· Gather requirements by regular interviews, document analysis, workshops, business process descriptions, use business case scenarios, business analysis, task and workflow analysis 
· Analyzed, transformed and optimized large data sets, built dashboards using flat files and RDBMS databases that will feed the dashboards 
· Developed Macros, SET ANALYSIS to provide custom functionality in QlikView Applications. 
· Create PDF push reports using QlikView report editor. 
· Developed ETL Scripts while loading the data, resolving loops & ambiguity joins 
· Implemented security through section access at row level, tab level, report level at single sign-on window. 
· Created Dashboards using QlikView using various components like List Boxes, Sliders, Buttons, variety of Charts, Book marks. 
· Developed simple and complex reports including list, crosstabs and charts with drill-thru capabilities & report level calculations.
· Design, develop, and test QlikView dashboards to meet customer requirements
· Involved in Dashboard development .

Client		: Boots Secondary Sales 
Duration	: Mar 2015 – Dec 2015

Boots is a pharmaceutical company, in the United Kingdom. The company has 2600 stores in UK and operations in 11 Countries.  BOOTS Secondary Sales system has been designed for the secondary sales of the International market as well as UK. The system consists of the distributors and the sales made by the retail vendors. The system is designed to track all the sales made by the distributors. It helps the Business user to analysis distributor’s performance and the market share of their products in each country.

Technologies				:	Qlikview12.

SAMSUNG is a Multinational manufacturing Company Specializing in the development of hand held phones & consumer electronics headquartered in South Korea. We are developing the different dashboards for Samsung. 

Roles & Responsibilities:
· Attending meeting with clients to Gather requirements.

Project Description:
· CE Digital Logbook is an entity in Consumer Electronics department of Samsung.
· In CE Digital Logbook, we are capturing different types of modules namely Display Share, Counter Share, SEC Count, Sellout, Planograms and Target vs Achievement.
· Display Share is a KPI which shows how much quantity displayed in the store for demo purpose.
· Counter Share is sellout captured by SEC for all competitors.
· SEC Count is Count of Samsung employees working on this system.
· Sellout is sold values capturing from Store.
· Planogram is place assigned to different competitors to display demo pieces.
· Target vs Achievement is comparing how the stores and Samsung employees working.
· CE Digital Logbook gives the complete analysis of sellout of all competitors.

Project 2:

Project					:	OAMS (Outdoor Activity Management System)
Client					:	Cheil.
Technologies				:	Qlikview12.
Role					:	Senior QlikView Developer.
Cheil Worldwide Inc. is a marketing company under the Samsung Group that offers advertising, public relations, shopper marketing, digital marketing and etc. It was headquarters in Seoul, South Korea. Its major clients include Samsung, Absolut, Coca Cola and etc. Here we are developing dashboards and reports to Samsung.

Roles & Responsibilities:
· Gathering requirements from Clients.
· Understanding Business Process.
· Developing the dashboards and reports for OAMS.
· Supporting junior developers.

Project Description:
· OAMS is Outdoor Activity Management System i.e., OAMS is a system of deploying GSB (Glow Sign Board)s, ISB(Interior Sign Board)s and different types of fixtures for advertisement purpose.
· To deploy above different types of Fixtures responsible persons raise tickets with an app.
· In this project we are tracking the ticket journey and their stages.
· Main KPIs we are showing here are Ticket Count, Campaign wise & Category wise Analysis, Campaign’s start date and end date analysis
And how the tickets are moving in different stages Submission, Approval, Recce and Installation stages.

Project 3:

Project					:	SRMS (Samsung Retail Maintenance System)
Client					:	Cheil
Technologies				:	Qlikview11
Role					:	QlikView Developer.
Cheil Worldwide Inc. is a marketing company under the Samsung Group that offers advertising, public relations, shopper marketing, digital marketing and etc. It was headquarters in Seoul, South Korea. Its major clients include Samsung, Absolut, Coca Cola and etc. Here we are developing dashboards and reports to Samsung.

· Gathering requirements from Clients.
· Pulling Tables from different data sources.
· Developing Dashboards for specified requirements.
· Implementing incremental reloads to reduce reload time.
· Set analysis implementation in Visualization part.
· Deploying applications into Server.

Project Description:
· SRMS is Samsung Retail Maintenance System
· Samsung Retail maintenance system is an entity to handle the maintenance of stores.
· There is an analysis of are different levels of tickets i.e., L1, L2 and L3
· To track above ticketing syastem we developed different types of reports.
· Ticket analysis – Open, Problem Fixed, Cancelled, Rejected and Closed.
· Budget Report – how much PO money assigned to Vendors to close the tickets.
